intro.p: This node combines the input molecule components into joined molecules and writes the result molecules into the output table column. Defines the output column type automatically.
Supported Indigo types: Molecule, Query Molecule
The node is based on the Indigo cheminformatics toolkit.

fullDescription.option: Filter for choosing the component columns
Column name for the output molecules

ports.inPort: Table containing Indigo molecules or query molecules
ports.outPort: The same as input, plus the column with the combined components
